00010 ORDataProcessor(new OR1DHistoHistogramsDecoder)

00016 ORDataProcessor::EReturnCode OR1DHistoHistogramsWriter::ProcessMyDataRecord(UInt_t* record)
00017 {
00018   string histName = fHistNameBase;
00019   int iHist=1;
00020   while(gDirectory->Get(histName.data()) != NULL) {
00021     histName = Form("%s%02d", fHistNameBase.data(), iHist);
00022     iHist++;
00023   }
00024 
00025   string histTitle;
00026   for(size_t iKey = 0; iKey < f1DHistoHistogramsDecoder->NKeysOf(record); iKey++) {
00027     if(iKey != 0) histTitle += ", ";
00028     histTitle += f1DHistoHistogramsDecoder->IthKeyOf(record, iKey);
00029   }
00030 
00031   int nBins = f1DHistoHistogramsDecoder->NBinsOf(record);
00032 
00033   // this histogram is deallocated when the file is closed
00034   TH1D* fHistogram = new TH1D(histName.data(), histTitle.data(), nBins, 0, nBins);
00035  
00036   for(int iROOTBin = 1; iROOTBin <= nBins; iROOTBin++) {
00037     fHistogram->SetBinContent(iROOTBin, f1DHistoHistogramsDecoder->IthBinOf(record, iROOTBin-1));
00038   }
00039 
00040   fHistogram->Write();
00041   
00042   return kSuccess;
00043 }
